for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
    if (cookies[i].indexOf('is_compass_premium=true') > -1) {
        isPremiumUser = true;
        break;
    }
}

if (isPremiumUser && !isPremiumHost) {
    if (location.hostname.indexOf('colleges') === 0) {
        location.href = location.href
            .replace('colleges', 'premium')
            .replace('rankingsandreviews.', '');
    } else if (location.hostname.indexOf('www') === 0) {
        location.href = location.href.replace('www', 'premium');
    }
} else if (isPremiumHost && !isPremiumUser) {
    location.href = location.href.replace('premium', 'www');
}</script><nav class="Box-s85n6m5-0-nav jkoLE" data-hook="header"><div class="s85n6m5-0-Box-cwadsP OAMOF"><div class="Header__LogoSection-s1n4ydat-0 dVzWOQ"><a href="https://www.usnews.com"><picture         </p>
        <h5>
          <a class="needsclick ntv-headline ntv_link1057006-315069 ntv-headline-anchor" href="https://www.usnews.com/brandfuse2?prx_t=vc4EATdg1A7iAQA&amp;ntv_fr" onmousedown="PostRelease.GetHrefUrl('https://jadserve.postrelease.com/trk?ntv_at=3&amp;ntv_ui=4d83e0c6-ed57-437c-b2e2-bbd6f9ec1807&amp;ntv_a=vc4EATdg1A7iAQA&amp;ntv_fl=-YNQb7Lo_nLKsmkJxKHzjA==&amp;ord=893731369&amp;ntv_ht=_hfXXAA&amp;ntv_tad=16&amp;ntv_r=https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/clk/441254925;245040628;c?https://www.usnews.com/brandfuse2?prx_t=vc4EATdg1A7iAQA', true, this, '1057006-315069');" onclick="PostRelease.GetHrefUrl('https://jadserve.postrelease.com/trk?ntv_at=3&amp;ntv_ui=4d83e0c6-ed57-437c-b2e2-bbd6f9ec1807&amp;ntv_a=vc4EATdg1A7iAQA&amp;ntv_fl=-YNQb7Lo_nLKsmkJxKHzjA==&amp;ord=893731369&amp;ntv_ht=_hfXXAA&amp;ntv_tad=16&amp;ntv_r=https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/clk/441254925;245040628;c?https://www.usnews.com/brandfuse2?prx_t=vc4EATdg1A7iAQA', true, this, '1057006-315069');" rel="nofollow" title="5 Reasons You Should Consider the GRE General Test for Business School">5 Reasons You Should Consider the GRE General Test for Business School</a>
        </h5>
        <p>Find out if the GRE General Test could better your admission chances.</p>
